Las_Vegas.North Las Vegas Airport:
North Las Vegas Airport (IATA: VGT, ICAO: KVGT, FAA LID: VGT) is three miles northwest of downtown Las Vegas, in North Las Vegas, in the State of Nevada. It is owned by Clark County and operated by the Clark County Department of Aviation.
Known locally as Northtown, it is the second-busiest airport in the Las Vegas area and the third-busiest in Nevada.
